org.gearvrf

Class GVRMaterialMap

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.gearvrf.GVRHybridObject
      • org.gearvrf.GVRMaterialMap
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    GVRShaderMaps

    public class GVRMaterialMap
extends GVRHybridObject
implements GVRShaderMaps
    Name map for material shaders.

    A GVRMesh specifies a scene object's surface geometry; a GVRMaterial specifies a scene object's surface appearance. A GVRMaterial specifies a shader by id, and contains named values. These names are not necessarily the same as the names of the attributes and uniforms in the shader program: the methods of this class let you map names from materials to programs.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class org.gearvrf.GVRHybridObject
